DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Compare Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Of Marketed Product TobraDex® To An Experimental Ophthalmic Sterile Ointment Containing Tobramycin And Dexamethasone In Aqueous Humor In Patients Undergoing Indicated Cataract Surgery
